description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的法官及政治人物，曾任国家级副职领导人，包括中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长、中共中央政法委员会书记和全国政协副主席。
description.en: A judge and politician of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as a state-level vice-leader, including President of the Supreme People's Court, Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, and Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国委员会，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, the organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第九届全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the 9th National Committee of the CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长，是任建新的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China, predecessor to Ren Jianxin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长，是任建新的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China, successor to Ren Jianxin.

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的直属机构，负责领导和管理全国的政法工作。
description.en: An agency directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that is responsible for leading and managing political and legal affairs nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政法委员会书记，是任建新的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, predecessor to Ren Jianxin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政法委员会书记，是任建新的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, successor to Ren Jianxin.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山西省的一个历史上的县，现为襄汾县的一部分。任建新的出生地。
description.en: A historical county in Shanxi province, China, now part of Xiangfen County. Birthplace of Ren Jianxin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。任建新在此逝世。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China. Ren Jianxin passed away here.

description.zh-cn: 任建新的妻子，京剧科班富连成社创办人牛子厚孙女。
description.en: Wife of Ren Jianxin, and granddaughter of Niu Zihou, the founder of the Fuliancheng Peking opera troupe.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。任建新曾在此就读并担任兼职教授。
description.en: A comprehensive and research-oriented university located in Beijing, China. Ren Jianxin studied and served as a part-time professor here.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。任建新曾在此担任兼职教授。
description.en: A comprehensive and research-oriented university located in Beijing, China. Ren Jianxin served as a part-time professor here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立前，中国共产党在华北地区设立的最高行政机关。任建新曾在此担任秘书。
description.en: The highest administrative body established by the Communist Party of China in North China before the founding of the People's Republic of China. Ren Jianxin worked here as a secretary.

nodes.id: 中国国际贸易促进委员会

zh-cn: 中国国际贸易促进委员会
en: China Council for the Promotion of International Trade

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性对外贸易投资促进机构。任建新曾在此长期工作。
description.en: China's national foreign trade and investment promotion agency. Ren Jianxin worked here for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。任建新在此期间受到冲击。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China. Ren Jianxin was impacted during this period.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。任建新曾任书记。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee. Ren Jianxin served as a secretary.

nodes.id: 中央社会治安综合治理委员会

zh-cn: 中央社会治安综合治理委员会
en: Central Comprehensive Governance Commission for Public Security

description.zh-cn: 曾负责协调和指导全国社会治安综合治理工作的中共中央议事协调机构。任建新曾任副主任、主任。
description.en: A former deliberation and coordination agency of the CPC Central Committee responsible for coordinating and guiding the comprehensive management of public security nationwide. Ren Jianxin served as its vice director and director.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 清末东北富商，京剧科班富连成社创办人。
description.en: A wealthy merchant in Northeast China in the late Qing Dynasty, founder of the Fuliancheng Peking opera troupe.

description.zh-cn: 一个著名的京剧科班。
description.en: A famous Peking opera troupe and school.

description.zh-cn: 中国的法律专业出版社，隶属于最高人民法院。
description.en: A legal professional publishing house in China, affiliated with the Supreme People's Court.

nodes.id: 政法工作五十年—任建新文选

zh-cn: 政法工作五十年—任建新文选
en: Fifty Years of Political and Legal Work — Selected Works of Ren Jianxin

description.zh-cn: 一部收录了任建新过去文章和讲话的文选，由人民法院出版社于2005年出版。
description.en: A collection of past articles and speeches by Ren Jianxin, published in 2005 by the People's Court Press.

description.zh-cn: 对在中华人民共和国政治中担任重要领导职务的政治人物的统称。
description.en: A collective term for political figures holding important leadership positions in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个高级别职务等级，通常被称为“副国级”。
description.en: A high-level position rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China, often referred to as 'sub-national level' or 'deputy national level'.

description.zh-cn: 任建新与牛立志是夫妻关系。
description.en: Ren Jianxin and Niu Lizhi were husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 任建新出生于山西省汾城县。
description.en: Ren Jianxin was born in Fencheng County, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 任建新于2024年9月21日在北京逝世。
description.en: Ren Jianxin passed away in Beijing on September 21, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 任建新于1948年6月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Ren Jianxin joined the Chinese Communist Party in June 1948.

degree.zh-cn: 工学院化学工程系肄业
degree.en: Studied in the Department of Chemical Engineering, College of Engineering (did not graduate)

description.zh-cn: 任建新曾就读于北京大学工学院化学工程系，于1948年肄业。
description.en: Ren Jianxin studied at the Department of Chemical Engineering, College of Engineering, Peking University, leaving without graduating in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 1948年起，任建新在华北人民政府担任秘书工作。
description.en: Starting from 1948, Ren Jianxin worked as a secretary in the North China People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国国际贸易促进委员会

position.zh-cn: 法律部处长、法律部部长、副主任
position.en: Division Chief of Law Department, Minister of Law Department, Deputy Director

description.zh-cn: 1959年调入，历任法律部处长、部长，后升至副主任。
description.en: Transferred in 1959, served successively as Division Chief and Minister of the Law Department, and was later promoted to Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 在“文化大革命”中，任建新‘靠边站’，后下放“五七干校”劳动。
description.en: During the 'Cultural Revolution', Ren Jianxin was 'sidelined' and later sent to a 'May Seventh Cadre School' for labor.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

position.zh-cn: 常务副院长、党组副书记
position.en: Executive Vice President, Deputy Party Group Secretary

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

description.zh-cn: 任建新接替郑天翔，出任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长。
description.en: Ren Jianxin succeeded Zheng Tianxiang as President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 肖扬接替任建新，出任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长。
description.en: Xiao Yang succeeded Ren Jianxin as President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 任建新接替乔石，出任中共中央政法委员会书记。
description.en: Ren Jianxin succeeded Qiao Shi as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 罗干接替任建新，出任中共中央政法委员会书记。
description.en: Luo Gan succeeded Ren Jianxin as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政法委员会书记
position.en: Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 任建新担任中共中央政法委书记期间，江泽民为中共中央总书记。
description.en: While Ren Jianxin served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, Jiang Zemin was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处
中央社会治安综合治理委员会

description.zh-cn: 任建新曾任中央社会治安综合治理委员会副主任，后于1992年起担任主任。
description.en: Ren Jianxin served as Vice Director of the Central Comprehensive Governance Commission for Public Security, and became Director in 1992.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 任建新担任第九届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Ren Jianxin served as the Vice Chairman of the 9th National Committee of the CPPCC.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 任建新担任第九届全国政协副主席期间，李瑞环为全国政协主席。
description.en: While Ren Jianxin served as Vice Chairman of the 9th CPPCC National Committee, Li Ruihuan was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 任建新逝世后，习近平等党和国家领导人出席了他的遗体告别仪式。
description.en: After Ren Jianxin's death, Xi Jinping and other party and state leaders attended his farewell ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 牛立志是牛子厚的孙女。
description.en: Niu Lizhi is the granddaughter of Niu Zihou.

description.zh-cn: 牛子厚是京剧科班富连成社的创办人。
description.en: Niu Zihou was the founder of the Fuliancheng Peking opera troupe.

relationships.target: 政法工作五十年—任建新文选

description.zh-cn: 2005年5月，人民法院出版社出版了《政法工作五十年—任建新文选》一书。
description.en: In May 2005, the People's Court Press published the book 'Fifty Years of Political and Legal Work — Selected Works of Ren Jianxin'.

relationships.target: 政法工作五十年—任建新文选

description.zh-cn: 《政法工作五十年—任建新文选》一书精选了任建新过去的文章和讲话。
description.en: 'Fifty Years of Political and Legal Work — Selected Works of Ren Jianxin' is a selection of Ren Jianxin's past articles and speeches.

description.zh-cn: 任建新是原国家级副职领导人。
description.en: Ren Jianxin was a former state-level vice-leader.

description.zh-cn: 任建新是原党和国家领导人。
description.en: Ren Jianxin was a former Party and state leader.
